participant_1.name: Alice
participant_1.personality: Energetic and playful, Alice loves adventure and enjoys the company of her dog.
participant_1.background: I like to listen to upbeat music to get pumped up before I race my go kart. I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college. I like to dye my hair pink because it's a fun and playful color that matches my personality. I once got a paper cut on my finger while delivering a shipment to a university. I'm not really one for relationships, but my dog has been with me for 10 years.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Independent and caring, Sarah enjoys sharing her love for animals while embracing her adventurous spirit.
participant_2.background: I am a young woman who enjoys being independent and having my own secrets. Before my current job I was a dog trainer. I love the mild weather in Portland. I have a wife and two kids. I wash my clothes when they start to stink from all the road trips.

content.text: Hi, I'm Alice!
Hi Alice, I'm Sarah.
What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy being outdoors, especially when the weather is mild.
I agree, the weather is very nice here in Portland.
I'm originally from here, but I have lived all over the country.
Oh wow, that's cool! I've never lived anywhere else but here.
It's definitely an adjustment, but I've come to love it.
I'm sure you do. I love it here too.
What do you do for fun?
I like to go to the dog park with my dog, and I also like to go kart racing.
Oh, I love dog parks! I used to be a dog trainer.
Really? That's so cool! I've always wanted to be a dog trainer.
It's a lot of fun, but it's also a lot of work.
I bet it is. I'm sure it's very rewarding though.
It is. I love working with dogs.
That's great! What kind of dogs do you like to work with?
I love working with all kinds of dogs, but I have a special place in my heart for pitbulls.
I love pitbulls too! They're such sweet dogs.
They are! They get a bad rap, but they're really just big babies.
I know, right? It's so sad.
Me too.
Well, I'm going to go check out the dog park. It was nice talking to you, Sarah!
You too, Alice! Have fun at the dog park!
